message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $110. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I can do $100, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great product, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $95?
I can see you're serious about getting this product, but I've got to make a profit. I can do $105, and that's as high as I can go. Take it or leave it!
I'm getting close, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. Can you do $98?
I've given you a good deal so far, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I can do $110, and that's my final offer. If you're not interested, I have other buyers waiting.
I understand you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. Can you meet me at $102?
I've been very patient with you, Bob. I'm not willing to go any higher than my previous offer, so I'm sticking with $110. If you're not interested, I'll have to move on to other buyers.

I understand you're not willing to budge, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to compromise at $108, but that's my final offer. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider buying from John for $120.
